list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bring or gather together (things, typically when scattered or widespread).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he went around the office collecting old coffee cups
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đi vòng quanh văn phòng thu thập ly cà phê cũ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: call for and take away; fetch.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the children were collected from school
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những đứa trẻ được thu thập từ trường học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: regain control of oneself, typically after a shock.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he paused for a moment to take a breath, to collect himself
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh dừng lại một lúc để hít một hơi, để thu thập chính mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (a horse) to bring its hind legs further forward as it moves, thereby shortening the stride and increasing balance and impulsion.
(in church use) a short prayer, especially one assigned to a particular day or season.
